body.name: Trodat Stamp 'N Stick Clothes and Personal Belongings DIY Stamper, English Text with Special Characters – 3 Lines – Dermatologically Tested Ink, Dishwasher and Washing Machine Safe Ink

features: Do it yourself (DIY) stamping kit is the ideal name stamp for clothing and as a label maker for kids. Help avoid mix-ups with your kid’s school items, while giving them a little responsibility to take care of their property
Create a personalized stamp with 3 lines and allowing up to 14 characters per line – – provides a quick and easy solution to identifying t-shirts, uniforms, drink bottles, books and so much more

Self inking stamp includes 1 black textile ink cartridge and features 1 letter and number set with fun icons, 30 durable stickers, 1m iron fleece, 1 set of tweezers providing a full kit of customized options

Dermatologically tested ink, waterproof up to 203°F when stamped directly on to textiles, up to 140°F when stamped on to fleece and dishwasher safe up to 167°F when stamped on stickers and applied to a range of plastics

Stamp directly on to fabrics, paper and cardboard. Mark the hardcover labels and stick them on to tougher materials including shoes, tupperware, toys, pencils etc. You can also stamp the iron fleece for better readability when marking darker textiles
body.description: Stamp 'N Stick The FUNctional way to mark all your belongings With Stamp 'n Stick you can stamp directly onto clothes and fabrics, stamp onto durable stickers for labeling school supplies, lunch boxes and many other belongings, or utilize the included iron-on fleece for darker textiles. Comes with everything to get you stamping

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Stamp 'N Stick The FUNctional way to mark all your belongings With Stamp 'n Stick you can stamp directly onto clothes and fabrics, stamp onto durable stickers for labeling school supplies, lunch boxes and many other belongings, or utilize the included iron-on fleece for darker textiles. Comes with everything to get you stamping Package Includes: 30 durable stickers and 1mm iron fleece for many applications Letter and number set with fun icons
Your Self Inking Stamp Stamp directly on light colored textiles or on paperDermatologically tested black textile inkMachine washable on textiles up to 203°F
Letter & Number Set with Fun Icons DIY set of text and icons with a pair of tweezersAdd your childs name, class, phone number or email addressComes with 8 fun icons

Durable Stickers & Iron-On Fleece Includes 30 stickers in 2 sizes: 1.5" x .4" & 1.5" x .6"Dishwasher safe up to 167°F (on plastic)For better legibility when marking dark textilesSuitable for most fabricsMachine washable up to 140°F

Special Stamp. Special Ink. Stamp 'N Stick utilizes a special dermatologically tested textile ink, which allows for sharp impressions on fabrics, stickers, paper and more and resists fading in both the washing machine and dishwasher while also being gentle on the skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a mom essential
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this on a whim a few days ago when I realized I had missed the window for custom name camp labels (last child, I’m tired). I wasn’t sure if this would work well or not, but I cannot stress how easy and great this stamp kit is. I labeled all of my younger kid’s stuff the night before he went to his first sleepaway camp, and it could not have be easier. Bonus is you have plenty of letters and can swap out for a different kid’s name. The icons are nice to make embarrassing labels on everything a bit more tolerable haha.I found there to be a bit of a learning curve to get the stamp to align properly on the thinner sized stickers included, but once I lined the stamp frame up with the perforated sticker sheet lines, it was fine. Now to see if kiddo keeps his stuff together at camp or throws laundry all over the floor like at home … tbd!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought for school
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my son when he entered pre-k because his teachers want everything labeled. The stamp is great; I like that it can be changed for all of my kids. But by far, the best part about this bundle is the stampable stickers. The stamp goes on clear, dries quickly, and the stickers stick to everything! They even stay on clothing through the wash and stay on his water bottle through the dish washer. I wish I could buy more stickers separately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Yes! This is definitely what I was looking for! I highly recommend it. Just follow the instructions and I recommend let it dry for a bit so it doesn’t smudge. I feel like all mommies need this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This item was easy to place the letters and does it jobs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This does in fact stay on the label after washing BUT it’s really difficult to set up. So after many failed attempts at getting my daughter’s name to show correctly (not upside down and backwards) I was not interested in making them for the other kids. PITA basically.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works really well!
reviews.reviewText: So easy to customize stamp and works super well on textiles. I bought it to label my sons items for daycare and it worked exactly as it should.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, but smears easily
reviews.reviewText: Small printing, and smears easily, so be careful! Otherwise this product is fine if you need to put name in clothing quickly and without sewing.
It worked exactly as it was supposed to. Easy to apply and easy to assemble. Perfect for what I needed it for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Why have I not bought one of these sooner?! The stamp is easy to use, fairly simple to set up and I was able to change the name between my two kids in very little time. The actual stamping on the clothes looks good and is clear to read-it’s a bit smaller than I’m used to with normal printed name tapes but that’s not a problem.I haven’t washed the clothes yet but to be honest if it dies wear off it’s so quick and easy to restamp I don’t mind!

Molto più pratico di tanti kit di adesivi/termoadesivi in commercio. Un unico prodotto per timbrare direttamente i vestiti, oppure adesivi (per oggetti) o nastro termoadesivo (per vestiti scuri o tessuti non timbrabili). Si può comporre la scritta a piacimento: adatto per più figli o per necessità di spazio diverse. Facilmente reperibile l'inchiostro di ricambio (ma non credo si esaurirà a breve), idem la fettuccia di nastro termoadesivo, reperibile più o meno ovunque online.
Does what it describes. Quality and ease of use is ok, bot great. Hence 4 star.
Ottimo prodotto! Devo dire che anche dopo alcuni lavaggi in lavatrice ima scritta è ancora ben visibile! Molto Soddisfatta 😁 !
